#summary CPI Online Application Programming Interface
#labels Featured

 = Service =

 The CPI Online is running at [http://cpi.cognitiveprofile.com/ cpi.cognitiveprofile.com].

 = Result Data =

 The CPI Online includes [http://www.json.org/ JSON] data access via a Result URL as 
{{{
   URL/data.json
}}}
 
 For example, 
{{{
   http://cpi.cognitiveprofile.com/profile/b390a019eff70566/data.json
}}}

 = Result Display Image =

  The CPI Online includes result display image access via a Result URL as 
{{{
   URL/image.png
}}}
 
 For example, 
{{{
   http://cpi.cognitiveprofile.com/profile/b390a019eff70566/image.png
}}}
